scripts.css:min: postcss --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer --use cssnano -o public/css/min.css public/css/main.css --no-map
scripts.doit: npm i && npm run css:min && npm run compile
scripts.css:watch: nodemon --exec npm run css:min --watch public/css -e css
scripts.blog:watch: nodemon --exec npm run compile:dev --watch blog --watch compiler -e js,md,html
